title: Why the Galileo Affair is Completely Misunderstood
description: There are few episodes in history that are so misunderstood as the condemnation of Galileo. His trial has become a stock argument to show the fundamental clash between science and dogmatism. Turns out the whole affair was actually a giant clash of egos, with churchmen and scientists on both sides of the argument.   TO HELP OUT THE SHOW Leave an honest review on iTunes.
